alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Sangamon; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 7:34PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SCOTT...SOUTHWESTERN SANGAMON AND MORGAN COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front ahead of a line of thunderstorms from 8 miles east of Pleasant Hill to near Shipman. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. These winds will precede any showers or thunderstorms by several minutes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Winchester, Alexander, Auburn, New Berlin, Waverly, Meredosia, Loami, Bluffs, Franklin, Murrayville, Woodson, Chapin, Manchester, Alsey, Naples, Exeter, Literberry, South Jacksonville, and Thayer. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 43 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
